pkgmetadata.longdescription: ===================ECS Compose-X Specs===================`Specifications for ECS Compose-X.`_Visit the `Compose-X repositories on GitHub`_, `use-cases walkthroughs`_ and the `blog`_.. _Specifications for ECS Compose-X.: https://ecs-composex-specs.compose-x.io.. _Compose-X repositories on GitHub: https://github.com/compose-x.. _use-cases walkthroughs: https://labs.compose-x.io.. _blog: https://blog.compose-x.io
